htmlbody:
De Wakkere Burger is a movement for a participatory democracy. The organization is active in the Dutch-speaking part of Belgium and is focusing on the local and regional level.

De Wakkere Burger supports, in a co-operation, participatiewiki.org, the Dutch version of Participedia.
